title: SoC COMM_ST 241-0-20 Theories of Relational Communication

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This is an introduction to a range of Communication theories that are applicable to everyday life. It will compare the differences of these theories. Students will apply these theories to different everyday situations.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: West, R. & Turner, L.H. (2014). Introducing Communication Theory 2014 A 2010 edition is acceptable Galvin, K. M. (2011) Making Connections: Readings in Relational Communication.Oxford University Press: New York

subject: COMM_ST
